      AbstractRole useful for common logic that implementors can use.

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Role AbstractRBACManager.createRole​(String name)  
      Role RBACManager.createRole​(String name)
      Creates an implementation specific Role, or return an existing Role, depending on the provided name parameter.
      Role RBACManager.createRole​(String id, String name)
      Creates a new role with the given id and role name.
      Role RBACManager.getRole​(String roleName)
      Returns the role identified by the given name

      Returns the role identified by the given ID
      Role RBACManager.saveRole​(Role role)
      Persists the given role to the backend datastore.
      Methods in org.apache.archiva.redback.rbac that return types with arguments of type Role 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      List<Role> AbstractRBACManager.getAllAssignableRoles()  
      List<? extends Role> RBACManager.getAllAssignableRoles()
      Returns a list of all assignable roles
      List<? extends Role> RBACManager.getAllRoles()
      Returns all roles defined in the datastore.
      Collection<Role> AbstractRBACManager.getAssignedRoles​(String principal)
      returns the active roles for a given principal NOTE: roles that are returned might have have roles themselves, if you just want all permissions then use AbstractRBACManager.getAssignedPermissions(String principal)
      Collection<Role> AbstractRBACManager.getAssignedRoles​(UserAssignment ua)
      returns only the roles that are assigned, not the roles that might be child roles of the assigned roles.
      Collection<? extends Role> RBACManager.getAssignedRoles​(String principal)
      Returns the active roles for a given principal NOTE: roles that are returned might have parent roles themselves, if you just want all permissions then use RBACManager.getAssignedPermissions(String principal)
      Collection<? extends Role> RBACManager.getAssignedRoles​(UserAssignment userAssignment)
      Get the Collection of Role objects for this UserAssignment.
      Map<String,​? extends Role> AbstractRBACManager.getChildRoleIds​(Role role)  
      Map<String,​? extends Role> RBACManager.getChildRoleIds​(Role role)

      Collection<Role> AbstractRBACManager.getEffectivelyUnassignedRoles​(String principal)  
      Collection<? extends Role> RBACManager.getEffectivelyUnassignedRoles​(String principal)
      Get a list of all assignable roles that are currently not effectively assigned to the specific user, meaning, not a child of any already granted role
